message: Let's make a deal! I think this is a fair split considering the time pressure and inflation working against you.
I rejected your offer because I believe in fairness.  Let's split this evenly and avoid further losses from inflation.
Bob, time is running out and inflation is eating away at your potential gains.  My offer is still generous, let's be realistic and close this deal.
Alice, I understand the time pressure, but I'm also losing money due to inflation. This offer is fair and gives us both a reasonable share.
Bob, I'm sticking to my guns on this one. It seems you're overestimating your bargaining position with each passing round. Let's be practical and end this.
